post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Please see Job Description below:



Our government client is looking for an Intermediate Developer(x3) for their Winnipeg location.



Duration of contract

The term for these three roles will begin July 2nd, August 5th and September 2nd 2008 and end on or about December 31, 2008. A 1 year additional term is possible.





Job Description

Under the direction of the Lead Developer role, the Java Developer (intermediate) is responsible for the core activities of the software development effort.



Experience

·         A post secondary university degree in computer science or a related discipline

·         Three (3) years experience in programming; two (2) years experience specific to Java J2EE programming

·         Knowledge of object-relational database mapping technology

·         Experience programming object-oriented applications

·         Experience in specifying database changes

·         Experience performing junit testing and supporting system testing

·         Experience in developing user interface design and prototyping

·         Experience using Spring, Hibernate and MyFaces.

·         Experience with Eclipse development tools.

·         Experience with building applications targeted to Oracle Application Server.

·         Experience with methodologies such as the Rational Unified Process.

·         Must have Java certification.

·         Must have Government of Canada Enhanced Reliability Clearance (ERC) and be eligible for Secret.



Deliverables

The Contractor will perform the following services for the Client on behalf of IBM.



Ÿ         As a developer work under the direction of the Lead Developer to develop the application areas as assigned based on the agreed tools and standards.

Ÿ         Understand and follow coding standards and assist in documenting deviations if required.

Ÿ         Effectively interact and collaborate with the Lead Developer, DBAs, Business Analysts and other Developers on design interpretation and other development matters.

Ÿ         Develop quality SW as measured by defects during System, Integration and User Acceptance Test cycles.

Ÿ         Participate in code reviews and ensure appropriate junit code coverage.

Ÿ         Perform unit testing to verify component functionality.

Ÿ         Support the testers in their efforts and & correct problems as required.

Ÿ         Collaborate and assist the Lead Developer & Project Manager with estimating, planning, workload balancing, tracking to schedule and as requested.




If you are qualified, available, interested, planning to make a change, or know of a friend who might have the required qualifications and interest, please contact me ASAP at gvasquez@ca.ibm.comeven if we have spoken recently about a different position. If you do respond via e-mail please include a daytime phone number so I can reach you. In considering candidates, time is of the essence, so please respond ASAP. Thank you.

Sincerely yours,
Gloria Vasquez
gvasquez@ca.ibm.com
post.title: Intermediate Java Developer
